law.catch_line: Advancements; Detailed Statements; Filing By Recipients
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] Such officers shall, within thirty days after receipt of an advance, file with the comptroller a detailed statement of the amounts expended subsequent to the previous accounting, approved by the officer or department authorized to supervise such expenditure, with vouchers therefor if they can be obtained. All advances so made shall be accounted for and vouchers therefor filed with the comptroller before the close of the fiscal year.
